Package gameComponents

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board class is the class creating the board and managing it at a logic level, meaning regulating the insertion of a token in the gameBoard with proper controls, creating the board itself, controlling if a series of token placed in a correct way determine a win or a draw in the overlying match and providing methods particularly useful in other classes accessing them.
    Match
    Match class is the class representing the match of a game, so everything concerning who is actually playing, which turn is it, the gameBoard and its state (so what tokens are in it), whose turn is it and so on.
    Player
    Class that represents a player.
    Token
    Class representing the Token, defined as the element the player can interact with, so the element determining players' "moves".
